name: The Lost Legends of Redwall™: Escape the Gloomer
description: Lost Legends of Redwall: Escape the Gloomer is based on Mossflower, one of the New York Times best-selling and award-winning Redwall™ books by Brian Jacques, with over 35 million copies sold. Set in the caverns and catacombs of Kotir Castle, you guide Gillig the fledgling otter as you build your story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later (32 bit) Processor: Amd Athlon L110 (passmark score 300) or Intel Atom D410 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VGA 1024x768 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Any windows supported sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Amd Athlon Turion Dual Core (passmark score 900) or Intel Celeron Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any card with 1080p output DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Any windows supported sound card
